title: IceCubeGFUClusterAlerts
description: IceCube Gamma-ray Follow-Up (GFU) Neutrino Cluster Alerts

cluster_alert_mode.description: Which method used to identify source location, i.e. all-sky monitoring or source-list monitoring

monitored_source_name.description: Principal name of monitored source in source-list

source_list_type.description: Source-list(s) that the monitored source is on, i.e. gev-gamma-ray influenced, tev-gamma-ray influenced, x-ray influenced

alternative_source_names.description: Array of other names associated with the monitored source

time_window_start.description: Start time of the intial event that defines the best fit time window found by the flare candidate likelihood [ISO 8601]

time_window_duration.description: Duration of the best fit time window between the start (time_window_start) and end (trigger_time) [s]

good_detector_uptime.description: Amount of time [s] during the flare candidate time window where detector was operating and data was determined to be good quality
